keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackle the key issues of our area, business rates.
Tackle the key issues of our area, Motor Fuel Duty increases.
Tackle the key issues of our area, local health service.
Tackle the key issues of our area, continuous rises in taxation.

issues.economy: The growing costs of a simple life, people who are continually faced with greater bills for business rates, council tax, road fuel, energy cost.
issues.governance: The list is endless, and it seems like legalised robbery in so many ways.
issues.health: Tackle the key issues of our area, local health service.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am 43 years of age, I was born and raised on a council estate in Carmarthen, and I have been married to Susie for 20 years, and have 2 children, Leah (21) & Josh (10). I believe if you work hard, you should be allowed to reap the rewards; I have always strived for my goals in life, and as yet have never failed.
